title: Comparing electric potential energy at two points

content.question: A test charge is placed at point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the charge-sphere system has potential energy <math alttext="U sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
